scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p content && rsync -av --delete --exclude='.github' --exclude='.git' ../../ ./content/ && ls -lah ./content && find content -name 'README.md' -execdir mv {} index.md \; && find content -name 'meta.json' -exec sed -i.bak 's/README/index/g' {} \; && find content -name '*.bak' -delete && ls -lah ./content
